TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Addon for JSI called JSI Adv Transparent Pods Stock Config v1.0 - Stock transparent windows for pods

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I was see that stock pods don't have a good support for the JSI Adv Transparent Pods. 

I was try to add this transparent windows like on the wiki from the mod JSI, but i couldn't get to work: JSIAdvTransparentPods · JPLRepo/JSIAdvTransparentPods Wiki (github.com)

or like with this planetary base mod: 

So i was just created new IVAs with only the windows 

Please help mi to improve this to only using depth mask to get support with e.g. raster prop monitor system: https://github.com/FirstPersonKSP/RasterPropMonitor

Download

GITHUB: popos123/JSIAdvTransparentPodsStockConfig: This is IVA addon aka transparent windows to stock pods based on JSI Advanced Transparent Pods (github.com)

Preview:

EDIT:

a video how i made this for development:

 

Edited July 4 by popos1

This is my dream mod! I hope one day that all pods for stock, Restock, and other major mods like Near Future have transparent windows and this seems to be a great start.

Unfortunately, I do not have the Blender/Unity know-how to make this happen myself but I hope your video is a decent start.

Do you intend to continue working on this mod? I noticed from a quick playthrough that the transparent windows will sometimes revert back to the original texture when moving the camera around the part. I also noticed that some parts have an actual window while others are just cutaways. Anyways, I'd be happy to help with this if I can learn it.

6 hours ago, RileyHef said:

This is my dream mod! I hope one day that all pods for stock, Restock, and other major mods like Near Future have transparent windows and this seems to be a great start.

Unfortunately, I do not have the Blender/Unity know-how to make this happen myself but I hope your video is a decent start.

Do you intend to continue working on this mod? I noticed from a quick playthrough that the transparent windows will sometimes revert back to the original texture when moving the camera around the part. I also noticed that some parts have an actual window while others are just cutaways. Anyways, I'd be happy to help with this if I can learn it.

Yes i know, today i was thinking about this to add this models instead internel view (IVA), but to the whole model by using a config files, i need to test this solution, if it will work it will fix this problem and transparent window will be always visable
This is such a great addition! Thank you so much and please continue to work on this!
Thank you thank you thank you! This is awesome!

good news, i was made new version, there is a lot of complicated things to do, now i need to sync animations from layer 0 to layer 16, and i dont know how to use "        [KSPField(isPersistant = true)]
        public PanelState state; 
for solar panel

Glad to hear you are still at work on this mod. I am looking forward to seeing the update released!

If possible, any documentation you can provide on the process would be appreciated. I would love to mimic this effect on modded command modules from other mods such as Restock and Near Future. I know this is likely a large ask, but the work you are doing has great potential that I hope the community can utilize in the future!

33 minutes ago, RileyHef said:

from other mods such as Restock and Near Future

And StockalikeStationPartsRedux!
